sqlMap.insert:
insert into client_goods_group_rack (id,seller_id, goods_id, group_price, per_number, permin_number, begin_time, end_time, ticket_begin_time, ticket_end_time, colse_bill_begin_time, colse_bill_end_time, seo_title, seo_keyword, seo_description, is_rack, is_allowrefund, rack_time, inspectors, market_total_number, refund_total_number, is_cash, is_fft_point, is_bank_point, is_fftpoint_cash, is_bankpoint_cash, is_fftpointcash_ratio_pricing, is_bankpointcash_ratio_pricing, cash_pricing, fft_point_pricing, bank_point_pricing, fftpoint_cash_pricing, bankpoint_cash_pricing, fftpointcash_ratio_pricing, bankpointcash_ratio_pricing, state, remark,create_time, update_time,merchant_id,buy_know) values (#id:INTEGER#,#sellerId#, #goodsId:VARCHAR#, #groupPrice:VARCHAR#, #perNumber:VARCHAR#, #perminNumber:VARCHAR#, #beginTime:VARCHAR#, #endTime:VARCHAR#, #ticketBeginTime:VARCHAR#, #ticketEndTime:VARCHAR#, #colseBillBeginTime:VARCHAR#, #colseBillEndTime:VARCHAR#, #seoTitle:VARCHAR#, #seoKeyword:VARCHAR#, #seoDescription:VARCHAR#, #isRack:VARCHAR#, #isAllowrefund:VARCHAR#, #rackTime:VARCHAR#, #inspectors:VARCHAR#, #marketTotalNumber:INTEGER#, #refundTotalNumber:INTEGER#, #isCash:VARCHAR#, #isFftPoint:VARCHAR#, #isBankPoint:VARCHAR#, #isFftpointCash:VARCHAR#, #isBankpointCash:VARCHAR#, #isFftpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#, #isBankpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#, #cashPricing:VARCHAR#, #fftPointPricing:VARCHAR#, #bankPointPricing:VARCHAR#, #fftpointCashPricing:VARCHAR#, #bankpointCashPricing:VARCHAR#, #fftpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#, #bankpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#, #state:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"),DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"),#merchantId#,#buyKnow#)
select last_insert_id() as id
sqlMap.update: update client_goods_group_rack set update_time =DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"),state=#state# where id=#id#
update client_goods_group_rack set update_time =DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"), market_total_number=market_total_number+#num# where id=#id#
